Add new platform.intro: Click on the edit button to start editing
Good Job! Now you can start editing. To add a new platform first click here on the platform button
Click anywhere on the map to specify the location for the new platform
Good job, you have successfully added a platform. Click escape to exit

Add new route.intro: Click on the edit button to start editing
Click on the browser to open it
Click on the create route button
Click on the toggle edit button button
Click on any marker to add it to the new route
Good job! you have successfully created a route
